function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased online shopping due to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to frequent online shopping","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols and contactless delivery procedures","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, self-sanitizing packaging","People":"Online shoppers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Online retailers, delivery companies"},{"Description":"Lack of physical and human touch in online retailing","Impact":"Reduced sense of connection and increased likelihood of isolation","Mitigation":"Integration of haptic interfaces and virtual agents to simulate human interaction","Technologies":"Haptic feedback systems, virtual agents, chatbots","People":"Online shoppers, e-commerce businesses","Owner":"Webshop owners, e-commerce technology providers"},{"Description":"Accelerated adoption of technology in brick-and-mortar and online retailing","Impact":"Increased reliance on digital technology and reduced human interaction","Mitigation":"Education and training on hygiene protocols and technology use for retail staff","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, touchless kiosks, training programs","People":"Retail staff, customers","Owner":"Retail businesses, technology providers"}]}
